targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as "Total Events" FROM "ThreatEvents" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "Category") as "Active Categories" FROM "ThreatEvents" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")

SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ThreatEvents" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL AND DATE("Timestamp") = CURRENT_DATE) as "Today",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ThreatEvents" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL AND DATE("Timestamp") = CURRENT_DATE - 1) as "Yesterday"

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup("Timestamp", '1h') as time,
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  "Category",
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY "Category"
ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup("Timestamp", '6h') as time,
  "Category",
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY time, "Category"
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  "Category",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY "Category"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp") as "Hour",
  "Category",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp"), "Category"
ORDER BY "Hour", "Category"

SELECT 
  "Category",
  COUNT(*) as "Current Period Events",
  LAG(COUNT(*), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "Category" ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('week', "Timestamp")) as "Previous Period",
  CASE 
    WHEN LAG(COUNT(*), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "Category" ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('week', "Timestamp")) = 0 THEN 100
    ELSE ROUND(((COUNT(*) - LAG(COUNT(*), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "Category" ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('week', "Timestamp"))) * 100.0 / LAG(COUNT(*), 1) OVER (PARTITION BY "Category" ORDER BY DATE_TRUNC('week', "Timestamp"))), 2)
  END as "Growth Rate %"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY "Category", DATE_TRUNC('week', "Timestamp")
HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
ORDER BY "Growth Rate %" DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10

WITH hourly_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    "Category",
    EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp") as hour,
    COUNT(*) as event_count
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
  GROUP BY "Category", EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp")
),
avg_hourly AS (
  SELECT 
    "Category",
    AVG(event_count) as avg_count,
    STDDEV(event_count) as stddev_count
  FROM hourly_stats
  GROUP BY "Category"
),
spikes AS (
  SELECT 
    hs."Category",
    hs.hour,
    hs.event_count,
    ah.avg_count,
    CASE 
      WHEN ah.stddev_count = 0 THEN 0
      ELSE (hs.event_count - ah.avg_count) / ah.stddev_count
    END as z_score
  FROM hourly_stats hs
  JOIN avg_hourly ah ON hs."Category" = ah."Category"
  WHERE ah.stddev_count > 0 
    AND (hs.event_count - ah.avg_count) / ah.stddev_count > 2
)
SELECT 
  "Category",
  hour as "Hour",
  event_count as "Events",
  ROUND(avg_count, 2) as "Avg Events",
  ROUND(z_score, 2) as "Z-Score"
FROM spikes
ORDER BY z_score DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  c."Name" as "Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY c."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  c."Name" as "Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."DestinationCountryId" = c."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND te."DestinationCountryId" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY c."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  cs."Name" as "Source Country",
  COALESCE(cd."Name", 'Unknown') as "Destination Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events",
  te."Category"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" cs ON te."SourceCountryId" = cs."Id"
LEFT JOIN "Countries" cd ON te."DestinationCountryId" = cd."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY cs."Name", cd."Name", te."Category"
HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 20

WITH country_risk AS (
  SELECT 
    cs."Name" as country,
    COUNT(*) as threat_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT te."Category") as category_diversity,
    COUNT(DISTINCT te."SourceAddress") as ip_diversity
  FROM "ThreatEvents" te
  JOIN "Countries" cs ON te."SourceCountryId" = cs."Id"
  WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  GROUP BY cs."Name"
)
SELECT 
  country,
  CAST(ROUND((threat_count * category_diversity * LOG(ip_diversity + 1)) / 1000, 2) as NUMERIC(10,2)) as "Risk Score"
FROM country_risk
WHERE threat_count > 100
ORDER BY "Risk Score" DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT 
  "SourceAddress" as "Source IP",
  COUNT(*) as "Events",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Category") as "Categories",
  MAX("Timestamp") as "Last Seen"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY "SourceAddress"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  "DestinationAddress" as "Destination IP",
  COUNT(*) as "Events",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Category") as "Categories",
  MAX("Timestamp") as "Last Seen"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
  AND "DestinationAddress" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "DestinationAddress"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 15
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT "SourceAddress") as "Unique Source IPs" FROM "ThreatEvents" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")

SELECT 
  "DestinationPort" as "Port",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
  AND "DestinationPort" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "DestinationPort"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  "SourcePort" as "Port",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
  AND "SourcePort" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "SourcePort"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  p."Name" as "Protocol",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Protocols" p ON te."ProtocolId" = p."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY p."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN "DestinationPort" BETWEEN 1 AND 1023 THEN 'Well-Known'
    WHEN "DestinationPort" BETWEEN 1024 AND 49151 THEN 'Registered'
    ELSE 'Dynamic'
  END as "Port Range",
  p."Name" as "Protocol",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Protocols" p ON te."ProtocolId" = p."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND te."DestinationPort" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "Port Range", p."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC

WITH repeat_ips AS (
  SELECT 
    "SourceAddress",
    COUNT(*) as total_events,
    MIN("Timestamp") as first_seen,
    MAX("Timestamp") as last_seen
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY "SourceAddress"
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
)
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(te."Timestamp", '6h') as time,
  COUNT(DISTINCT te."SourceAddress") as "Repeat Offender IPs"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
INNER JOIN repeat_ips ri ON te."SourceAddress" = ri."SourceAddress"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  mf."Name" as "Malware Family",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "MalwareFamilies" mf ON te."MalwareFamilyId" = mf."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY mf."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(te."Timestamp", '12h') as time,
  mf."Name" as "Malware Family",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "MalwareFamilies" mf ON te."MalwareFamilyId" = mf."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY time, mf."Name"
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  mf."Name" as "Malware Family",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "MalwareFamilies" mf ON te."MalwareFamilyId" = mf."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY mf."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  te."Category",
  mf."Name" as "Malware Family",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "MalwareFamilies" mf ON te."MalwareFamilyId" = mf."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY te."Category", mf."Name"
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY "Events" DESC

SELECT 
  ar."Number" as "ASN",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar ON te."AsnRegistryId" = ar."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
GROUP BY ar."Number"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 20
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ar."Id") as "Unique ASNs" FROM "ThreatEvents" te JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar ON te."AsnRegistryId" = ar."Id" WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")

WITH asn_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    ar."Number" as asn_name,
    COUNT(*) as event_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT te."Category") as category_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT te."SourceAddress") as ip_count
  FROM "ThreatEvents" te
  JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar ON te."AsnRegistryId" = ar."Id"
  WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  GROUP BY ar."Number"
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
)
SELECT 
  asn_name as "ASN",
  event_count as "Events",
  category_count as "Categories",
  ip_count as "Unique IPs",
  CAST(ROUND((event_count * category_count * LOG(ip_count + 1)) / 10000, 2) as NUMERIC(10,2)) as "Threat Score"
FROM asn_stats
ORDER BY "Threat Score" DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(te."Timestamp", '1d') as time,
  ar."Number" as "ASN",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar ON te."AsnRegistryId" = ar."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND ar."Number" IN (
    SELECT ar2."Number" 
    FROM "ThreatEvents" te2
    JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar2 ON te2."AsnRegistryId" = ar2."Id"
    WHERE te2."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
      AND $__timeFilter(te2."Timestamp")
    GROUP BY ar2."Number"
    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    LIMIT 5
  )
GROUP BY time, ar."Number"
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup("Timestamp", '1h') as time,
  EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp") as hour,
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
GROUP BY time, hour
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  EXTRACT(dow FROM "Timestamp") as "Day of Week",
  EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp") as "Hour",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" 
WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY EXTRACT(dow FROM "Timestamp"), EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp")
ORDER BY "Day of Week", "Hour"

WITH hourly_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp") as hour,
    "Category",
    COUNT(*) as event_count
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
  GROUP BY EXTRACT(hour FROM "Timestamp"), "Category"
)
SELECT 
  hour as "Hour",
  SUM(event_count) as "Total Events",
  STRING_AGG("Category" || ' (' || event_count || ')', ', ' ORDER BY event_count DESC) as "Top Categories"
FROM hourly_stats
GROUP BY hour
ORDER BY "Total Events" DESC
LIMIT 10

WITH weekend_weekday AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(dow FROM "Timestamp") IN (0, 6) THEN 'Weekend'
      ELSE 'Weekday'
    END as day_type,
    COUNT(*) as event_count
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY 
    CASE 
      WHEN EXTRACT(dow FROM "Timestamp") IN (0, 6) THEN 'Weekend'
      ELSE 'Weekday'
    END
)
SELECT 
  day_type as "Period",
  event_count as "Events",
  ROUND(event_count * 100.0 / SUM(event_count) OVER (), 2) as "Percentage"
FROM weekend_weekday
ORDER BY event_count DESC

WITH coordinated_attacks AS (
  SELECT 
    "SourceAddress",
    "DestinationAddress",
    "DestinationPort",
    "Category",
    COUNT(*) as event_count,
    MIN("Timestamp") as first_seen,
    MAX("Timestamp") as last_seen,
    EXTRACT(epoch FROM (MAX("Timestamp") - MIN("Timestamp"))) / 60 as duration_minutes
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
    AND "DestinationAddress" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY "SourceAddress", "DestinationAddress", "DestinationPort", "Category"
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 50
    AND EXTRACT(epoch FROM (MAX("Timestamp") - MIN("Timestamp"))) / 60 < 60
)
SELECT 
  "SourceAddress" as "Source IP",
  "DestinationAddress" as "Target IP",
  "DestinationPort" as "Port",
  "Category",
  event_count as "Events",
  ROUND(duration_minutes, 2) as "Duration (min)",
  first_seen as "Started",
  last_seen as "Ended"
FROM coordinated_attacks
ORDER BY event_count DESC
LIMIT 20

WITH minute_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    $__timeGroup("Timestamp", '5m') as time,
    COUNT(*) as event_count
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND $__timeFilter("Timestamp")
  GROUP BY time
),
avg_counts AS (
  SELECT 
    AVG(event_count) as avg_count,
    STDDEV(event_count) as stddev_count
  FROM minute_counts
)
SELECT 
  mc.time,
  mc.event_count as "Events",
  ac.avg_count as "Average",
  ac.avg_count + (2 * ac.stddev_count) as "Spike Threshold"
FROM minute_counts mc
CROSS JOIN avg_counts ac
ORDER BY mc.time

WITH persistent_threats AS (
  SELECT 
    "SourceAddress",
    "Category",
    COUNT(*) as total_events,
    COUNT(DISTINCT DATE("Timestamp")) as active_days,
    MIN("Timestamp") as first_seen,
    MAX("Timestamp") as last_seen,
    EXTRACT(epoch FROM (MAX("Timestamp") - MIN("Timestamp"))) / 86400 as duration_days
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  GROUP BY "SourceAddress", "Category"
  HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT DATE("Timestamp")) >= 10
    AND COUNT(*) > 500
)
SELECT 
  "SourceAddress" as "Source IP",
  "Category",
  total_events as "Total Events",
  active_days as "Active Days",
  ROUND(duration_days, 1) as "Duration (days)",
  ROUND(total_events::numeric / active_days, 2) as "Events/Day",
  first_seen as "First Seen",
  last_seen as "Last Seen"
FROM persistent_threats
ORDER BY duration_days DESC, total_events DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN "DestinationPort" IN (22, 23, 80, 443, 3389) THEN CAST("DestinationPort" as TEXT)
    WHEN "DestinationPort" BETWEEN 1 AND 1023 THEN 'Other Well-Known'
    WHEN "DestinationPort" BETWEEN 1024 AND 49151 THEN 'Registered'
    ELSE 'Dynamic/Private'
  END as "Port Category",
  te."Category" as "Threat Category",
  p."Name" as "Protocol",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Protocols" p ON te."ProtocolId" = p."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND te."Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
  AND te."DestinationPort" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY "Port Category", te."Category", p."Name"
HAVING COUNT(*) > 100
ORDER BY "Events" DESC

WITH recent_events AS (
  SELECT 
    te."Id",
    te."Timestamp",
    te."SourceAddress",
    te."DestinationAddress",
    te."DestinationPort",
    te."Category",
    cs."Name" as source_country,
    cd."Name" as dest_country,
    p."Name" as protocol,
    mf."Name" as malware_family
  FROM "ThreatEvents" te
  LEFT JOIN "Countries" cs ON te."SourceCountryId" = cs."Id"
  LEFT JOIN "Countries" cd ON te."DestinationCountryId" = cd."Id"
  LEFT JOIN "Protocols" p ON te."ProtocolId" = p."Id"
  LEFT JOIN "MalwareFamilies" mf ON te."MalwareFamilyId" = mf."Id"
  WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND te."Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 hour'
  ORDER BY te."Timestamp" DESC
  LIMIT 25
)
SELECT 
  "Timestamp" as "Time",
  "SourceAddress" as "Source",
  source_country as "Src Country",
  "DestinationAddress" as "Destination",
  dest_country as "Dst Country",
  "DestinationPort" as "Port",
  "Category",
  protocol as "Protocol",
  malware_family as "Malware"
FROM recent_events
ORDER BY "Time" DESC

WITH threat_summary AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_events,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "SourceAddress") as unique_sources,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "DestinationAddress") as unique_destinations,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "Category") as categories,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "AsnRegistryId") as unique_asns,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "SourceCountryId") as source_countries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "DestinationCountryId") as dest_countries,
    COUNT(DISTINCT "MalwareFamilyId") as malware_families
  FROM "ThreatEvents" 
  WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
),
top_values AS (
  SELECT 
    (SELECT "Category" FROM "ThreatEvents" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL AND "Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY "Category" ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1) as top_category,
    (SELECT cs."Name" FROM "ThreatEvents" te JOIN "Countries" cs ON te."SourceCountryId" = cs."Id" WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL AND te."Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY cs."Name" ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1) as top_source_country,
    (SELECT ar."Name" FROM "ThreatEvents" te JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar ON te."AsnRegistryId" = ar."Id" WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL AND te."Timestamp" >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY ar."Name" ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1) as top_asn
)
SELECT 
  'Total Events' as "Metric",
  CAST(ts.total_events as TEXT) as "Value",
  'Last 30 days' as "Period"
FROM threat_summary ts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Unique Source IPs', CAST(ts.unique_sources as TEXT), 'Last 30 days' FROM threat_summary ts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Unique Destinations', CAST(ts.unique_destinations as TEXT), 'Last 30 days' FROM threat_summary ts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Active Categories', CAST(ts.categories as TEXT), 'Last 30 days' FROM threat_summary ts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Unique ASNs', CAST(ts.unique_asns as TEXT), 'Last 30 days' FROM threat_summary ts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Source Countries', CAST(ts.source_countries as TEXT), 'Last 30 days' FROM threat_summary ts
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Top Category', tv.top_category, 'Most Active' FROM top_values tv
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Top Source Country', tv.top_source_country, 'Most Active' FROM top_values tv
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Top ASN', tv.top_asn, 'Most Active' FROM top_values tv
